alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:20PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln County through 345 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm NEAR Freedom, or NEAR Thayne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alpine, Thayne, southern Palisades Reservoir, Star Valley Ranch, Freedom, Turnerville, Grover, Star Valley Rest Area, Meadow Creek Guard Station, Stewart Peak, Auburn, Bedford, Etna and Alpine Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
